values:
Hey folks. I know i said on my other journal (new one : abadbreed) that I would be updating my photo journal, but honestly, I'm way too lazy to post individually a bunch of my pictures. so here's the link to my photobucket album. check all of those out if you wish, and then, once I start getting pictures taken in school, I'll post those and you can compare them to see which is better. 

http://photobucket.com/albums/v18/BlueAja/

enjoy!!
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/5852.html
the living room area the kitchen the hallway bedroom 1 bedroom 2 the bathroom the fridge that i get. it's a really nice place. sorry these pictures suck.
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/5382.html

Turners Falls is the town where Hallmark Institute of Photography is located. This is where I will be living next year. a cool looking church some street Thank God they have a Subway...and even kids playing around it a street corner i don't know this is...it may be a park or something...i just took the picture as we drove by in the car Oh here's the park. Some cool houses. I just took this picture because the sign says Montague. and yes, for those of you who are 21 or up when you come visit me, there is booze. I'll be adding the pictures of the actual school sometime soon. I'll try to get them up tonight or tomorrow.
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/5308.html
I got this around Valentine's Day
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/4893.html

We bought two maps when we get lost, and this is Ashley on the phone with Green Man. Ruler of the Maps Nick and Kat pre-piercing What time we arrived for my 430 appointment Jumping on the chair Listening to the prep talk My stencil being put on This is either just my stencil, or the black outlining. I can't tell or remember when this pic was taking In... ...and out...FYI Nick is the sicko that took pictures of Ashley getting pierced. Kat's after shot Me getting inked And here it is. The final product
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/3108.html

Here's some of my pictures that I have taken, developed and printed in the darkroom at the school. Seeing that I started up photography class again, there will be more sooner or later. Colin in orchestra Lestat and Echo...I miss them both. Close up of Amy Morgan Becca...don't mind the random red blotch on the picture. It's not on the real print, but I couldn't get a picture on my digital of it that would work without that on there. Oh well. Mike freaking out...or being himself...whichever. Cait and Nick...ain't they cute?
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/2832.html

Ladies and gentlemen, they are finally here. The pictures from Denny's. Horray. There are some pictures mixed in here from when we were waiting at the school for Herps and Eh to show up. A bacon moustache "People stink." "We'll have a resturant that is the female equivolant of Hooters...it'll be called Weiners." I just think Claudia looks cute standing next to this sign. We had no idea what we were dibbs-notting. Eh just put her finger on her nose, and I followed, and everyone joined in. I was threatening to steal Tiffany's boobs. Karyn made a hat. "I want to be your pimp." Karyn is singing/coughing. We added neither Claudia's feet...don't ask me. Karyn took it. lol. Samarui John I'm a pillow again. Karyn's reaction to the Pimp comment...actually I don't really remember when she had this expression on her face...that just sounded good. I've noticed something. Whenever I go out to eat, I always order some big meal, and I never eat it all. That was just before I finished eating...whatever. Now Tiffany has the hat. Our check. It was almost 50 bucks. My milkshake brings all the boys to the yard. Does anyone remember why Eh and John started beating the crap out of each other. Finger-licking good. And that was breakfast. Horray.
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/2663.html
Here are some pictures after a Backfire practice over winter break. Greg had left saying "don't play my drums". pictures to come: more school day shoots and pictures from Denny's
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/2341.html

alright, i'm finally adding pictures from when we went back to school and i messed around with my new digital on the people of glastonbury. I'm a pillow Now Ashley's a pillow Karyn taking a shwig from the wonderful school water supply Gail running away from Tommy Lee who took the pic. Colin laughing at me Karyn and Claudia walking to gym class...good times. me and Tiffany walking away from orchestra. Karyn's purdy makeup "Snuggle me!" Ashley told me to post this picture. Amy...what have you been up to? Colin wanted more attention, so he stole my camera. over Ashley's shoulder...i don't know, i like this picture a lot Silly Nick and Alex "Jenn? Are you there? Jenn? Hello??" Ahh! It's Mike ...ohh...it's just yogurt...nevermind. a part of the lunch bunch. enjoy. more will be coming, i'm sure.
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/2202.html

Adam's cat, Max, after looking like a kangaroo and playing with a lite candle Adam playing "Heart Shaped Box" on the piano Adam freaking out Adam wishing Scout a happy New Year me and Adam Adam surprised me and took this when I came out of the bathroom. Adam bringing in the New Year by banging a pot Happy New Year
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/1797.html

there's my uncle Bill before he had a mental breakdown...sorry kids, no after pictures. my dumbass dog Tucker That's my sister demonstrating what her new half-sleeve tattoo of the virgin Mary with a skull face is going to look like this is what my brother looks like after playing his new X-Box for a few hours straight. my sweet ass new stereo my dipshit stepbrother Matt, who i wanted to punch in the face the whole day. my dumbass dog again, playing with his new toy that we deemed Rufus 2, seeing that he had the exact same toy once, and ripped it to shreads...with is certainly destined to be the end of this toy, as with all his others. my grandparents...the cutest people on the planet. my grandfather just opened a box of scratch tickets in our family Grab Bag (which is ended up giving to my sister) and my grandmother was rather excited...my sister ended up winning about 10 bucks. I call this piece "Celebration". It's my uncle Bo holding up a collection of oils, the prized gift of this years Grab Bag...see where I get my insanity yet? Yes, those are Guinuess beer flip-flops the prized oils get taken from my stepmother. and at the end of it all, the cool people in the family end up just sitting on our asses in the TV room, playing with our new toys, bored out of our minds and praying to leave. Merry Christmas
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/1548.html
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/1305.html

alright, i think it's time to add some photos, eh? I'm going with some Grey Cell Green for right now.... Steve rockin it out. Purdy Curty feeling himself...not really. Matt and pretty colored drums. Scott and his hella sweet bass. Alright, that was great. Here's some Backfire. Enjoy. You know you want to... Nick and Adam with a lightpost out of his head. A wonderful shot of my wonderful Adam My favorite shot of the whole SHU show...funny that it's not even of them playing...I love candid shots like this. A cool Greg and Jeff shot I swear to God I'm not biased. That's good for now, huh? enjoy.
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/1081.html

...the funk soul brother... sorry that was random, i'm listening to that song by fatboy slim. let's get this journal started off eh? because my computer is gee, i'm only going to put one in here right now. a little grey cell green for your heads
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/662.html

ok this is my new journal. i decided to join everyone else who has a photo journal and start my own. so enjoy. i'm going to start by putting up some of my backfire and grey cell green photos, and then hopefully if i get a digital camera for christmas, i'll be able to add more of just good fun shit. so enjoy, once i start adding photos. i love getting feedback and knowing what you all think of my pictures, so let me know what you think.
http://photo-head.livejournal.com/265.html
